predicate.note: Frames file for 'concede' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Verbnet class future_having-13.3, but that's not a very common sense.

roleset.name: admit

example.name: sentential thing arg1
example.text: Reviewing the company's scrape with disaster, Mr. Price conceded it had tried to do too much on its own.
example.arg: Reviewing the company's scrape with disaster
it had tried to do too much on its own

example.name: nominal arg1, almost idiomatic
example.text: Because most businesses put market share above profitability, to let a competitor's addition to capacity go unmatched is *trace* to concede defeat.

roleset.note: This is essentially another verb of saying, so expect some of the same constructions (fronted, split, etc) as in 'say' etc.
